titles.title: To authorize the reprinting of Senate Document 87-64, entitled "History of the United States Senate, 1787-1801".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 12/4/1987--Introduced. Provides for the reprinting of the Senate document entitled "History of the United States Senate, 1787-1801" with a suitable cover commemorating the Bicentennial of the Senate and a new preface prepared by the Majority Leader and the Minority Leader. Authorizes the printing of additional copies for distribution by the Secretary of the Senate.
